Description_lang: Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, $?s53376&c2[causing Judgment to generate $53376s3 additional Holy Power, ]?s53376&c3[each Holy Power spent causing you to explode with Holy light for $326731s1 damage to nearby enemies, ]?s53376&c1[reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by $53376s2%, ][]$?s326730[allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, ][]increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by $s2% for $d.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage, healing, and critical strike chance increased by $w2%. $?a53376&a137029[Holy Shock's cooldown reduced by $w6%.]?a53376&a137028[Judgment generates $53376s3 additional Holy Power.]?a53376[Each Holy Power spent deals $326731s1 Holy damage to nearby enemies.][]

description_blz.en_US: Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Invocas la Luz para convertirte en un avatar de reprensión, lo que aumenta un 20% tu daño, sanación y probabilidad de golpe crítico durante 20 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Convoca a Luz para se tornar um avatar da retaliação, aumentando em 20% sua chance de acerto crítico por 20 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Ruft das Licht an, um zu einem Avatar der Vergeltung zu werden. Erhöht Euren Schaden, Eure Heilung und Eure kritische Trefferchance 20 Sek. lang um 20%.
description_blz.en_GB: Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Invocas a la Luz para convertirte en un avatar de la reprensión, y esto aumenta un 20% tu daño, tu sanación y tu probabilidad de golpe crítico durante 20 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous faites appel au pouvoir de la Lumière pour devenir un avatar de vindicte, ce qui augmente vos dégâts, vos soins et vos chances de coup critique de 20 % pendant 20 s.
description_blz.it_IT: La Luce trasforma in un avatar del castigo, aumentando i danni inflitti, le cure fornite e la probabilità di critico del 20% per 20 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вы взываете к Свету, становясь аватарой воздаяния, в результате чего наносимый вами урон, сила исцеления и вероятность критического удара увеличиваются на 20% на 20 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 빛의 힘을 불러내어 응징의 화신이 됩니다. 20초 동안 공격력과 치유량, 치명타 및 극대화율이 20%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 呼喚聖光以成為懲戒的化身，使你的傷害、治療效果和致命一擊機率提高20%，持續20秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 召唤圣光之力，成为惩戒的化身，你的伤害、治疗效果和爆击几率提高20%，持续20秒。
